summary: The 2021 President's Management Agenda identified federal customer experience as a priority area for improvement across the government. To address it, the Office of Management and Budget set 2 long-term cross-agency priority goals: improving customer experience for services and improving key life experiences—e.g., retirement—that require members of the public to navigate multiple federal agencies. We found that OMB has addressed key considerations we previously suggested...
title: Federal Customer Experience: OMB Has Taken Actions to Implement Cross-Agency Priority Goals
